page.title: 06Moving into Great Broughton
page.content: When my husband came home one evening in April and told me we were moving to Wilton on Teeside, all sorts of things immediately sprang to mind, for instance, where would we live. However that decision was soon made for me as we drove through the village of Gt Broughton. We had come from a village just outside Harrogate and found that very picturesque but nothing to equal where we now live. The hills on a clear day as I wait for the children from school will always be something I will appreciate. As a newcomer I felt very apprehensive but again I need not have worried. Everyone has been friendly and helpful, and as an anxious mum I wondered how the children would settle, but they too have quickly made new friends.
